name.description: Specifies the name of the Web App Bot. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Must be globally unique.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Web App Bot. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku.description: The SKU of the Web App Bot. Valid values include `F0` or `S1`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

microsoft_app_id.description: The Microsoft Application ID for the Web App Bot. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

display_name.description: The name of the Web App Bot will be displayed as. This defaults to `name` if not specified.

developer_app_insights_key.description: The Application Insights Key to associate with the Web App Bot.

developer_app_insights_api_key.description: The Application Insights API Key to associate with the Web App Bot.

developer_app_insights_application_id.description: The Application Insights Application ID to associate with the Web App Bot.

luis_app_ids.description: A list of LUIS App IDs to associate with the Web App Bot.

luis_key.description: The LUIS key to associate with the Web App Bot.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Bot Web App.

create.description: Used when creating the Bot Web App.

update.description: Used when updating the Bot Web App.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Bot Web App.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Bot Web App.
